languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.
languages.original_text: В качестве цели этой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} можно выбирать только существ, на которых действует эффект горения или варп-{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Если цель является союзником, она не получает урон. Все существа (как враги, так и союзники) на соседних с целью клетках получают эффекты психосилы Воспламенение.

traits.locale_text: This psychic power impacts only creatures suffering from Warp Burn or burning. Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers from the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

languages.text: В качестве цели этой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} можно выбирать только существ, на которых действует эффект горения или варп-{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Если цель является союзником, она не получает урон. Все существа (как враги, так и союзники) на соседних с целью клетках получают эффекты психосилы Воспламенение.
languages.original_text: This psychic power only impacts creatures suffering from warp burn or burning. Everyone adjacent to the target point suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

traits.locale_text: Эта психосила действует только на существ, на которых наложены эффекты горения или варп-горения. Все существа на клетках, смежных с выбранной точкой, получают эффекты психосилы Воспламенение.
Эта психосила действует только на существ, на которых наложены эффекты горения или варп-горения. Все существа на клетках, смежных с выбранной точкой, получают эффекты психосилы Воспламенение.

languages.text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的目标必须处于“{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}”或“亚空间烧灼”状态。如果目标为友军，则目标不会受到任何伤害。目标周围的所有生物（不分敌我），都会受到{g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}星火燎原{/g}这一灵能能力的影响。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.

traits.locale_text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的目标必须处于“{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}”或“亚空间烧灼”状态。如果目标为友军，则目标不会受到任何伤害。目标周围的所有生物（不分敌我），都会受到星火燎原这一灵能能力的影响。

languages.text: Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} solo puede utilizarse contra criaturas afectadas por quemadura de la disformidad o {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}. Si el objetivo es aliado, este poder psíquico no le inflige daño. Todas las criaturas adyacentes al objetivo (aliados y enemigos) sufren los efectos del poder psíquico {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignición{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.

traits.locale_text: Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} solo puede utilizarse contra criaturas afectadas por quemadura de la disformidad o {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}. Si el objetivo es aliado, este poder psíquico no le inflige daño. Todas las criaturas adyacentes al objetivo (aliados y enemigos) sufren los efectos del poder psíquico Ignición.

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} wirkt nur auf Kreaturen, die unter dem Effekt von Warp-Brand oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} stehen. Wenn das Ziel ein Verbündeter ist, fügt diese psionische Kraft ihm keinen Schaden zu. Jeder in der Nähe des Ziels (sowohl Verbündete als auch Feinde) erleidet die Auswirkungen der psionischen Kraft {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Entzünden{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} wirkt nur auf Kreaturen, die unter dem Effekt von Warp-Brand oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} stehen. Wenn das Ziel ein Verbündeter ist, fügt diese psionische Kraft ihm keinen Schaden zu. Jeder in der Nähe des Ziels (sowohl Verbündete als auch Feinde) erleidet die Auswirkungen der psionischen Kraft Entzünden.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} wirkt nur auf Kreaturen, die unter dem Effekt von Warp-Brand oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} stehen. Wenn das Ziel ein Verbündeter ist, fügt diese psionische Kraft ihm keinen Schaden zu. Jeder in der Nähe des Ziels (sowohl Verbündete als auch Feinde) erleidet die Auswirkungen der psionischen Kraft Entzünden.

languages.text: Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} ne peut cibler que les créatures sous l'effet de Combustion Warp ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Si la cible est un allié, elle ne subit pas de dégâts. Alliés ou ennemis, tous les personnages adjacents à la cible subissent les effets du pouvoir psychique {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Enflammer{/g}.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.

traits.locale_text: Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} ne peut cibler que les créatures sous l'effet de Combustion Warp ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Si la cible est un allié, elle ne subit pas de dégâts. Alliés ou ennemis, tous les personnages adjacents à la cible subissent les effets du pouvoir psychique Enflammer.

Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} ne peut cibler que les créatures sous l'effet de Combustion Warp ou {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Si la cible est un allié, elle ne subit pas de dégâts. Alliés ou ennemis, tous les personnages adjacents à la cible subissent les effets du pouvoir psychique Enflammer.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}は、歪みの炎もしくは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を受けている生物にのみ効く。ターゲットが味方の場合、このサイキック・パワーでダメージは受けない。ターゲットに隣接する全員（敵味方問わず）が、サイキック・パワー発火の効果を受ける。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the Ignite psychic power.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}は、歪みの炎もしくは{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を受けている生物にのみ効く。ターゲットが味方の場合、このサイキック・パワーでダメージは受けない。ターゲットに隣接する全員（敵味方問わず）が、サイキック・パワー発火の効果を受ける。

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} yalnızca öte yanığına uğrayan veya {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} yaratıkları hedef alabilir. Hedef bir dost birimse bu ruhsezi gücü ona hiç hasar vermez. Hedefe bitişik hücrelerde bulunan herkes (hem düşman hem de dost birimler), {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Tutuştur{/g} ruhsezi gücünün etkilerine maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only target creatures suffering from warp burn or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. If the target is an ally, this psychic power deals no damage to it. Everyone adjacent to the target (both allies and enemies) suffers the effects of the {g|f:a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}Ignite{/g} psychic power.
